content: cluster in top of first cluster cluster in next cluster 2 clusters in next cluster working along edge of scarf work clusters evenly until you reach the first row worked work 2 clusters in end of row 1 cluster in each cluster across work 2 clusters in other end of row 1 work clusters evenly along other edge of scarf work 2 clusters in end of last row join with slip_stitch to top of chain-3 fasten yarn and weave in ends © 2007 beverly button http //www buttonspecialties com please do not reproduce sell or distribute this pattern by any means you may sell your finished work made from this pattern
